item.description:
Here's Your Chance to attend the most Exciting Fathers' Organization in the country.


You asked for a Meet-up, and here it is:


Fathers & Families will meet next Monday evening at the Wellesley Free Library, about three miles off Rt. 128. Click here for directions.


You will meet between 50 and 100 other fathers who are experiencing the same family court problems as you. You will meet the leadership of the most dynamic fathers' organization in the country, see what we are all about, and learn what we are doing to balance the scales of justice on behalf of children. Finally, many of us struggle with alienated children after separation or divorce. Nationally recognized expert Amy Baker of New York will be present to advise us how to deal with this most-painful experience, helping both ourselves and our children.


Women, if you choose to attend, you will not be alone -- and you are most cordially encouraged to attend!


If you have any questions, call me at 617-542-9300.


Hoping to meet you Monday,

Ned Holstein, MD, MS
Executive Director

group.name: The Boston Fathers' Rights Meetup Group

item.name: Fathers' Meetup Next Monday Evening
